Similar to how Ecosia plants trees and OceanHero recycles plastic, Ekoru.org has partnered with Big Blue Ocean Cleanup and Operation Posidonia to help keep our oceans clean and green.

Using the Ekoru new tab homepage search bar for your internet searches, enables you to automatically support a global community of people working hard to conserve and restore the ocean environment and ocean floors.
